text: This video can not be playedLondon has one of the largest Korean community outside both North and South Korea and is one of the  few places in the world that people from the two nations freely mix. The community recently celebrated the harvest moon festival, which was a chance for people to get together. One member of the community is Korean Billy, a popular South Korean influencer. He said he had never met anyone from the North before he moved to London and being able to do so gave him goosebumps.Story by Anna O'Neill
title: Inside the largest Korean community in the UK
